Package com.tellerulam.logic4mqtt.api

The classes in this package provide the logic4mqtt support API to scripts.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Events
    This class manages event handlers.
    Events.GetValuesEntry
    An array of instances of his helper class is returned by Events.getValues(String)
    Time
    The Time class contains methods for solar event calculations and simple time comparisions.
    Timers
    This class manages event timers.
    Utilities
    Various utility functions.

Package com.tellerulam.logic4mqtt.api Description

The classes in this package provide the logic4mqtt support API to scripts.

Each class is made visible at the top-level namespace of the scripting engine. If your scripts are Javascript, for example, you can call the method addTimer in class Timers simply by calling 

  Timers.addTimer("Test","every sunset",function(){
    ...
   });
